entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 06:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
